DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study develop computer program assist radiologist find breast cancer mammogram compare computer 's accuracy detect cancer direct digital film mammogram .
DOC.brief_title: Digital Mammography : Computer-Aided Breast Cancer Diagnosis
DOC.detailed_description: To develop computer-aided diagnosis ( CAD ) system full field digital mammography ( FFDM ) use advanced computer vision technique evaluate effect CAD interpretation digital mammogram ( DMs ) . This system assist radiologist four important area mammographic interpretation : ( 1 ) detection mass , ( 2 ) classification mass , ( 3 ) detection microcalcifications , ( 4 ) classification microcalcifications . The propose approach distinctly different previous approach image information two-view bilateral mammogram fuse single-view mammogram improve lesion detection characterization .
DOC.criteria: Females schedule mammographic exam . Females recommend workup biopsy due suspicious find mammogram . Females give inform consent . No subject 18 year age
